title: Advanced English Education Design Utilizing Digital Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in secondary English education and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Re-Training Program for In-Service Secondary English Teachers in Smartphone-Centric, Technology-Constrained Settings: 12-Week Course with Biweekly 2-Hour Offline Sessions

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to design learner-participatory English classes using smartphone-based collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet)
Enhancement of the ability to develop assessment items utilizing digital resources such as Quizlet and ClassKast
Strengthening competency in operating formative assessments applying real-time feedback tools (Kahoot!, Mentimeter)
Competency in applying a step-by-step pedagogical approach (based on the TPACK model) to enhance digital literacy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
